outline:
1. to flee, escape
    1. (Qal)
      1. to flee
      2. to escape
      3. to take flight,m depart, disappear
      4. to fly (to the attack) on horseback
    2. (Polel) to drive at
    3. (Hithpolel) to take flight
    4. (Hiphil)
      1. to put to flight
      2. to drive hastily
      3. to cause to disappear, hide
kjv_def: [idiom] abate, away, be displayed, (make to) flee (away, -ing), put to flight, [idiom] hide, lift up a standard.
strongs_def: to flit, i.e. vanish away (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver)
